Constructor Detail

Screen

public Screen(int xRes,
              int yRes)
Constructor for the screen object. Sets the screen resolution with values passed into the constructor.

Parameters:
xRes - The x resolution of the screen.
yRes - The y resolution of the screen.
Method Detail

clearScreen

public void clearScreen()
Clears the screen. At this point it only prints out a string indicating the screen was cleared.

getPixelCount

public int getPixelCount()
Returns the number of pixels on the screen.

Returns:
x resolution of the screen * y resolution of the screen.
